tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
*** ***** ** *** **** **** ******** ******* Having a dental treatment always sounds scary but Dr. Sheenu Goyal makes the patient feel so comfortable by explaining the issue and with her extra care , my Root Canal Treatment (rtc) become much easier. She is unlike other doctors who use their profession just to earn money by misguiding patients, rather she advised treatment in such a way which would avoid future complications and treatment cost.. Overall my dental experience at their clinic was a great one.

The ambience of the clinic is perfect , peaceful, clean and patient friendly..I highly recommend Dr. Goyals Dental & implant centre.0

review: I went for rct and capping highly satisfied. Visiting dentist from past 50 years but i found dr. Goyal the best. I am visiting dr. Goyal from last 4 years and my husband also. I recommend them  for your dental problems
